data.text: Ao, Onyankopɔn, fa wʼatɛntrenee dom ɔhene no,
Ɔde trenee bebu wo nkurɔfo atɛn,
Mmepɔw no de yiyedi bɛbrɛ nnipa no,
Ɔbɛko ama nnipa no mu amanehunufo
Owia ne ɔsram da so wɔ hɔ yi
Ɔbɛyɛ sɛ osu a ɛtɔ gu asase a wɔadɔw so so,
Atreneefo benyin frɔmfrɔm wɔ ne bere so;
Obedi hene afi po akosi po,
Sare so mmusua bɛkotow nʼanim
Tarsis ne mpoano ahemfo a wɔwɔ akyirikyiri
Ahemfo nyinaa bɛkotow no,
Na obegye mmɔborɔfo a wosu frɛ no,
Obehu wɔn a wɔayɛ mmrɛw ne ahiafo mmɔbɔ
Obegye wɔn afi nhyɛso ne akakabensɛm ase,
Ɔhene nkwa so!
Aburow mmu so wɔ asase no so nyinaa;
Ne din bɛtena hɔ daa;
Nhyira nka Awurade Nyankopɔn, Israel Nyankopɔn!
Nhyira nka ne din a anuonyam ahyɛ no ma no daa daa.
Yisai ba Dawid mpaebɔ no awiei ni.
